alert.note: Alert for Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 21 at 5:10AM AKST until January 22 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues to be possible. * WHERE...The following areas,northeast and eastern gulf coast. This includes the cities of Yakutat, Elfin Cove, And Pelican. * WHEN...Through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Flooding may occur in poor drainage areas. Extensive street flooding is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Rainfall totals of 6 to 8 inches are possible with periods of heaviest rainfall from Friday afternoon into Saturday morning. Freezing levels will rise through Friday to range from 2000 to 4000 feet.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area
